definitions.text: an area composed of subdivided lots
the act of subdividing; division of something previously divided
a division of some larger or more complex organization
examples: botany is a branch of biology
the Germanic branch of Indo-European languages

definitions.text: a self-contained part of a larger composition (written or musical)
examples: he always turns first to the business section
the history of this work is discussed in the next section

definitions.text: a section of a section; a part of a part; i.e., a part of something already divided
